Plot
 
Set two years after after "Hotaru no Hikari 2" drama series, Hotaru 

Amemiya learns that her boss and now husband Seichi Takano has dreamed 

of vacationing in Rome, Italy like in the movie "Roman Holiday". Hotaru 

then makes plans to go to Rome for their honeymoon. Rome, Italy prepare 

... Hotaru Amemiya and Seichi Takano are coming!
